formula: a(n) = binomial(n, A004526(n-5)). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Nov 28 2013Conjecture: -(n+6)*(n-5)*a(n) +2*(n)*a(n-1) +4*(n-1)*n*a(n-2)=0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 26 2015
maple: A037953:=n->binomial(n, floor((n-5)/2)); seq(A037953(n), n=0..50); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Nov 28 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
